introduction: The 20th annual Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards ("KCA") were held on March 31, 2007, hosted by Justin Timberlake. It was the highest rated show ever in the history of the Kids Choice Awards. The show was held at Pauley Pavilion at the University of California, Los Angeles. Gwen Stefani (with Akon) and Maroon 5 performed during the show.Online voting began on March 5, 2007. A "Name That Nominee" special hosted by Lil' JJ aired on March 11 and a "Deep Inside the KCAs" special hosted by Emma Roberts aired on March 18.Presenters for KCA 2007Zac Efron, Jessica Alba, Jack Black, Will Ferrell, Steve Carell, Queen Latifah, Jamie Lynn Spears, Hilary Duff, Nicole Kidman,George Lopez, Jon Heder, Chris Evans, Ice Cube, Drake Bell, Emma Roberts, Nelly, Ciara, Bindi Irwin, Shia LaBeouf, Hayden Panettiere, Masi Oka, Ty Pennington, Tyler James Williams, Nat Wolff, Alex Wolff, Devon Werkheiser, Lil' JJ, Chris Brown, Ryan Sheckler, and Tobey Maguire.Tom Kenny, the voice of Spongebob:was the announcerThe show was executive produced by Bob Bain, produced by Paul Flattery and the Supervising Producer was Greg Sills.List of nominees for KCA 2007MoviesFavorite MovieBig Momma's House 2ClickNight at the MuseumPirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest (winner)Favorite Movie ActorJohnny DeppJack BlackAdam Sandler (winner)Will SmithFavorite Animated MovieCarsHappy Feet (winner)Ice Age 2: The MeltdownOver the HedgeFavorite Movie ActressHalle BerryDakota Fanning (winner)Keira KnightleySarah Jessica ParkerFavorite Voice from an Animated MovieAshton Kutcher - Open SeasonQueen Latifah - Ice Age 2: The Meltdown (winner)Julia Roberts - The Ant BullyBruce Willis - Over the HedgeMusicFavorite Song"Bad Day" - Daniel Powter"Crazy" - Gnarles Barkley"Hips Don't Lie" - Shakira feat. Wyclef Jean"Irreplaceable" - Beyoncé (winner)Favorite Male SingerChris BrownJesse McCartneySean PaulJustin Timberlake (winner)Favorite Music GroupBlack Eyed Peas (winners)Fall Out BoyNickelbackRed Hot Chili PeppersFavorite Female SingerJessica SimpsonBeyoncé (winner)CiaraChristina AguileraTelevisionFavorite TV ShowAmerican Idol (winner)Drake & JoshFear FactorThe Suite Life of Zack and CodyFavorite TV ActressMiley Cyrus - Hannah Montana (Winner)Emma Roberts - UnfabulousJamie Lynn Spears - Zoey 101Raven-Symoné - That's So RavenFavorite TV ActorDrake Bell - Drake & Josh(winner)Jason Lee - My Name Is EarlCharlie Sheen - Two and a Half MenCole Sprouse - The Suite Life of Zack and CodyFavorite CartoonThe Fairly OddParentsThe Adventures of Jimmy Neutron: Boy GeniusThe Simpsons'SpongeBob SquarePants (winner)(Note: Nicktoons Network, in promotion of the awards show, aired a five hour marathon of the nominated Nicktoons on March 17, 2007.)SportsFavorite AthleteLeBron JamesShaquille O'Neal (winner)Alex RodriguezTiger WoodsOtherFavorite Video GameMadden NFL 07New Super Mario Bros.Mario KartSpongeBob SquarePants: Creature from the Krusty Krab (winner)Favorite BookHarry Potter (winner)How to Eat Fried WormsIsland of the Blue DolphinsA Series of Unfortunate EventsWannabe Award"Ben Stiller"Burp ContestJustin Timberlake (defending champ)Audience (winner)Slimed CelebritiesAndy CardenasJustin TimberlakeJackie ChanChris TuckerMandy MooreTobey MaguireSteve CarellVince VaughnTriviaOn the site it says there are 11 books in A Series of Unfortunate Events, but there are actually 13.When Dakota Fanning gave her speech, at the end of the speech, the music played before she finished, in a much similar way to the Academy Awards.When Justin was announcing the slime vote options, he said A, B, then D. He then corrected his error the second time.Gwen Stefani performed the same dance moves as she did when she was featured earlier the week on American IdolThe "detonator", was actually just a Staples "Easy Button" with the word easy covered up on a shiny metallic box.When the smoke and slime were in effect, the cameras shook to imitate the effect of shaking, however when it switched cameras, the second camera was not shaking, and when it returned to the view of the first camera, the first camera was shaking again.The KCA 07 were said to be "Twenty Minutes Longer." However, they were only ten minutes longer. Because of this, the SpongeBob Squarepants episode "Waiting" was shown to fill in the time slot.Almost all female awards were shown during commercials, while nearly all male awards were shown during the program.The TurboNick webcams on the orange carpet and inside the pavilion were delayed approximately 3 hours.The title belt that Justin Timberlake used while he was the Burping Champion was actually a replica of the WWE World Heavyweight Championship with stickers covering the plates.Justin Timberlake won the Favorite Male Singer award while also being the show's host.
